languages.text: "Их слова — следствие оправданной подозрительности, Ваша Светлость. Агентурная сеть культа Последнего восхода охватила многие миры и уже не раз проявляла себя. Думаю, техножрецы опасаются пустить в свои боевые порядки корабль, присягнувший изменникам".

traits.locale_text: "Агентурная сеть культа Последнего рассвета охватывает многие миры — их агенты могут быть где угодно. Скорее всего, техножрецы опасаются пустить в свои ряды скрытых предателей".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."
languages.original_text: "Их слова — следствие оправданной подозрительности, Ваша Светлость. Агентурная сеть культа Последнего восхода охватила многие миры и уже не раз проявляла себя. Думаю, техножрецы опасаются пустить в свои боевые порядки корабль, присягнувший изменникам".

traits.locale_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn's agent network has enveloped entire worlds, their emissaries can be anywhere. Most likely the Tech-Priests are afraid to let a vessel into their combat ranks as there is no way to tell whether is controlled by sleeper agents."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn's agent network has enveloped entire worlds, their emissaries can be anywhere. Most likely the Tech-Priests are afraid to let a vessel into their combat ranks as there is no way to tell whether is controlled by sleeper agents."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “他们的审慎反应是合理的，大人。终末黎明邪教的特工网络横跨整个世界，一次次渗透到了真理开拓者舰队之中。我猜测，技术神甫不敢让情况不明的舰船加入他们的舰队。”
languages.original_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."

traits.locale_text: “他们的审慎反应是合理的，大人。终末黎明邪教的特工网络横跨整个世界，一次次渗透到了真理开拓者舰队之中。我猜测，技术祭司不敢让情况不明的舰船加入他们的舰队。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Leur réaction est motivée par une méfiance légitime, Votre Seigneurie. Le réseau d'agents du Culte de l'Aube finale s'étend sur des planètes entières et a prouvé son efficacité à maintes reprises. Je suppose que les technoprêtres redoutent de laisser entrer un vaisseau traître dans leurs rangs. »
languages.original_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."

traits.locale_text: « Leur réaction est motivée par une méfiance légitime, Votre Seigneurie. Le réseau d'agents du culte de l'Aube finale s'étend sur des planètes entières et a prouvé son efficacité à maintes reprises. Je suppose que les technoprêtres redoutent de laisser entrer un vaisseau traître dans leurs rangs. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Ihre Reaktion resultiert aus abgewogener Vorsicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das Agentennetzwerk des Kults der letzten Dämmerung umfasst ganze Welten und hat immer wieder gezeigt, wie effektiv es vorgeht. Ich nehme an, die Techpriester sind abgeschreckt davon, ein trügerisch wirkendes Schiff in ihre Reihen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."

traits.locale_text: "Ihre Reaktion resultiert aus abgewogener Vorsicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das Agentennetzwerk des Kults der letzten Dämmerung umfasst ganze Welten und hat immer wieder gezeigt, wie effektiv es vorgeht. Ich nehme an, die Techpriester sind abgeschreckt davon, ein trügerisch wirkendes Schiff in ihre Reihen zu lassen."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Su reacción está justificada, pues están actuando con la debida cautela, {mf|milord|milady}. La red de agentes del Culto del Amanecer Final abarca mundos enteros y siempre han demostrado ser eficaces. Supongo que los tecnosacerdotes temen aceptar una nave traidora entre sus filas».
languages.original_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."

traits.locale_text: «Su reacción está justificada, pues están actuando con la debida cautela, {mf|milord|milady}. La red de agentes del Culto del Amanecer Final abarca mundos enteros y siempre han demostrado ser eficaces. Supongo que los tecnosacerdotes temen aceptar una nave traidora entre sus filas».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「彼らの反応は、合理的な警戒心の結果です。最後の夜明け教団のエージェント・ネットワークは世界全体に広がっており、その有効性は何度も証明されています。技術司祭たちは、裏切り者の船を戦闘部隊に入れることを恐れているのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの反応は、合理的な警戒心の結果です。最後の夜明け教団のエージェント・ネットワークは世界全体に広がっており、その有効性は何度も証明されています。技術司祭たちは、裏切り者の船を戦闘部隊に入れることを恐れているのでしょう」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, tepkilerinin sebebi temkinli olmaları. Haksız da değiller. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın dünyaları saran casus ağı, liyakatini defalarca kanıtlamıştır. Zannediyorum ki Tekno Rahipler, hain bildikleri bir gemiyi saflarına almaktan korkmaktalar."
languages.original_text: "Their reaction is the result of reasonable wariness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The agent network of the Cult of the Final Dawn spans entire worlds and has proven its effectiveness time and again. I presume the Tech-Priests are afraid of letting a treacherous vessel into their combat ranks."
